name: NetSpaceIndia
description: Netspaceindia founded in the winter of 2
overview:
Netspaceindia is a Abitindia Group Company, Which deals with IT related services.

Netspaceindia is one of India’s fastest growing privately held Hosting Service Providers (HSP). Netspaceindia provides wholesale server rentals to e-businesses, application providers and hosting resellers.

Netspaceindia founded in the winter of 2004 with aim to provide Hosting and Other related service to its customers located around the globe.

Our first priority is to provide our customers with the best value and the most reliable hosting available, and the second is to take indian IT Industry to its new heights. To provide best customer services we use state of art CRM (Customer Relationship Managment) software to manage all our services to our customers. We offers a wide range of virtualization and automation solutions to help individuals and organizations of all sizes realize the benefits of optimized computing.

Netspaceindia is led by a seasoned team of executives and experienced entrepreneurs who have proven track records in growing and managing global software companies.

We are also planing to launch our own fully owned datacenter which is currently in the planning stages keeping a vision to provide best support to our customer around the globe. If you would like to have more information about Netspaceindia please don’t hesitate to contact us.
